results.title: Metformin use and brain atrophy in nondemented elderly individuals with diabetes.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use and @<m>DISEASE_Microphthalmia_Syndromic_10</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566985 @@@brain atrophy@@@ in nondemented elderly individuals with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Nabizadeh F, Kankam SB, Balabandian M, Hashemi SM, Sharifkazemi H, Rostami MR, Alzheimer's disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI). Metformin use and brain atrophy in nondemented elderly individuals with diabetes. Exp Gerontol. 2022 Sep;166():111890. PMID: 35843348

results.title: Dendrobium nobile Lindl. Alkaloids Ameliorate Cognitive Dysfunction in Senescence Accelerated SAMP8 Mice by Decreasing Amyloid-beta Aggregation and Enhancing Autophagy Activity.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: DNLA and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatments prevented @<m>DISEASE_Microphthalmia_Syndromic_10</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566985 @@@brain atrophy@@@ and improved morphological changes in the hippocampus and cortex, as evidenced by Nissl and @CHEMICAL_Helium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006371 @@@H&E@@@ staining for @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuron damage and loss@@@, and by SA-beta-gal staining for aging cells.

citations.NLM: Lv LL, Liu B, Liu J, Li LS, Jin F, Xu YY, Wu Q, Liu J, Shi JS. Dendrobium nobile Lindl. Alkaloids Ameliorate Cognitive Dysfunction in Senescence Accelerated SAMP8 Mice by Decreasing Amyloid-beta Aggregation and Enhancing Autophagy Activity. J Alzheimers Dis. 2020;76(2):657-669. PMID: 32538851

results.title: Metformin promotes focal angiogenesis and neurogenesis in mice following middle cerebral artery occlusion.
results.text_hl: Results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment significantly reduced @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Microphthalmia_Syndromic_10</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566985 @@@brain atrophy@@@ volume compared to the control (p<0.05).

citations.NLM: Liu Y, Tang G, Zhang Z, Wang Y, Yang GY. Metformin promotes focal angiogenesis and neurogenesis in mice following middle cerebral artery occlusion. Neurosci Lett. 2014 Sep 5;579():46-51. PMID: 25026071
